THINKING ABOUT RENEWING YOUR CAR?

GIVE IT A PREMIUM TREATMENT TODAY!

As the leading car detailing company in the Reno/Sparks area, Car Detailing Reno stands as the premier choice for vehicle owners seeking unparalleled automotive care. Our mission is to redefine vehicle appearance through meticulous detailing, ensuring every client experiences the pinnacle of excellence in car care services.

Whether at our shop, your residence or job site, our skilled team of detailers delivers comprehensive car cleaning services with convenience and precision.

OUR SERVICES

INTERIOR DETAILING

Interior detailing involves deep cleaning and sanitizing all surfaces, including seats, carpets, and dashboards, ensuring freshness.

Read More

EXTERIOR DETAILING

Exterior detailing includes washing, waxing, and polishing the vehicle's surface to restore shine and protection.

Read More

MOTORCYCLES CLEANING

Wash body and wheels, clean engine carefully, lubricate chain, avoid water on electrical components.

Read More

RVS, BOATS

RVs and boats require specialized cleaning to maintain their appearance and prevent damage from elements.

Read More
